name: 180 degrees | digital strategies
tag_list: digital-communication, social-media, ecommerce, china, asia, hong-kong
overview:
180 degrees | digital strategies inc. is a Canadian consulting firm established in 2007. 180 degrees’ owner lived 4+ years in Mainland China to be as close as possible to our clients’ operations; he now lives in Hong Kong. 180 degrees works with a network of Chinese consultants all experts in their field of business or their industry.

For companies that are planning the challenge of international trade and market development, 180 degrees offers consultation services to suit all needs and budgets, emphasizing on a personalized approach to implement a range of flexible and specialized services.

180 degrees is specialized in market development through digital communication, social networks, ePR, and eCommerce.

The philosophy of 180 degrees is to be, not only a service provider, but also a strategic partner in the expansion and international growth processes. 180 degrees’ mission is to support firms in their process of international growth, especially in Hong Kong, Mainland China, and Asia.

Offering global expertise and contributing to its clients’ growth and success, 180 degrees wants to create value for small & mid-size entreprises.

180 degrees | digital strategies, your growth begins with our eStrategies.
